data.fullContent: Rosita wanted to visit a Spanish-speaking country because she was studying Spanish as a part of her university course. She chose a small town near Mexico City for her trip so she could practice her Spanish with the local speakers there. It took her five hours to get there, but she was proud of herself for being able to have a conversation with the taxi driver before he dropped her off at her hostel. She quickly got settled into her room and headed off to explore the town. She got lost several times but finally found her way and was able to have dinner with a native family who lived nearby. The next day she took a tour of the historical site and bought some souvenirs at the local market. It was a great trip, and she was proud of the fact that she was able to see the town and speak a different language.

q1.translation: 罗西塔想去一个说西班牙语的国家，因为她正在学习西班牙语，这是她大学课程的一部分。她选择了墨西哥城附近的一个小镇，这样她就可以和当地说西班牙语的人练习她的西班牙语。她花了5个小时才到达那里，但她为自己能够在出租车司机送她到旅社之前与他交谈而感到骄傲。
